entry.title: Studying in UESTC
entry.content:
UESTC

From Freshman to junior year

In 2021, entered UESTC with a college entrance exam score of 641.

In my freshman year, I found the school a bit dull—it felt like I was still living the same boring life as in high school, even though I was already in university🤦🏻‍♀️. Maybe it was because there were so few girls, and I only had one close friend who I really clicked with😢.

It wasn’t until sophomore year that I gradually found my direction and rhythm. Of course, I would also go to the other main campus to attend concerts and social events😍.

Junior year was the most interesting for me—I finally left Chengdu, a city I wasn’t very fond of🥲, and as I started my internship, I experienced living independently for the first time🥳.

Best friend in Uestc

Eat delicious food every weekend～

entry.title: Hello Yaxin
entry.content:
Welcome to My Blog! This is my first post. I love pretty and shiny things, like Christmas trees, butterflies, and ice cubes sparkling in the sunlight✨. Even though I’m aiming to become an AI engineer, I also have a casual love for Web development.

A brief understanding of me🩰

MBTI is INFJ

The INFJ personality type is like a hidden garden🌷, full of depth and mystery, where every thought and feeling blooms with purpose. They are dreamers, wrapped in a quiet empathy that flows like a gentle river, always seeking to understand the world and those around them on a deeper level. Their intuition is like stardust, guiding them toward paths others might not see, and their hearts beat with a deep compassion❤️‍🔥, always striving to make the world a more beautiful, meaningful place.

More info: INFJ

Friends I love

💓 LYQ, have been best friends for about 9 years!! Expect for a ten-year promise.

💓 Hua～Best friend in university, destined to be good friends.

Welcome to follow me on Xiaohongshu

🔎Search：28秒可爱🍥

More info: Link

Deep love for some tastes

🏆 cola of classic flavor, never bear sugar-free cola!!!

🧋deep Matcha head

🙃 never eat breakfast, it makes me feel uncomfortable
